Description:
Preparing, scheduling, coordinating and controlling projects.
Monitor compliance with applicable laws, practices, and quality assurance policies.
Quality control, performance standards and required specifications.
Follow up on work, budget, schedule, plans and staff performance and report regularly on project status.
Cooperating and communicating with the project manager and various departments to provide assistance and technical support.
Follow up on achievements and set delivery dates.
Review designs for plans and work on calculating quantities and costs.Skills
Skills:
Good knowledge in dealing with electromechanical engineering design programs.
Ability to do electrical and mechanical calculations.
The ability to plan efficiently and with high accuracy.
The ability to design facilities and ensure the required specifications.
Proficiency in project management and supervision skills.
Proficiency in the process of communicating in a distinctive way with different personalities.
Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering.
